html.p: Search Head Clustering provides high availability by replicating the user configuration settings, dashbaords, and reports across search heads. Users can use any member of the clusters and they will get the same user experience

ul.li: Automatic synchronization of files between dashboards
Search heads can be added / removed anytime without bringing down the entire cluster
Easier to administer the cluster through centralized interface
Cost effective, no need to buy expensive shared storage system
No single point failure in the architecture
